review.reason: Fully Reimbursed - See txs at bottom of table

submission.messageText:
1. 0x87C38d3cF3ea01C89bD913B6646A5e8A68a5FF71
2. EVvbXpzARs3MqLHkPpwXdKFcGtx74QP1BXUwWUq1Fg4P
3. 
4. Transaction turning USDC into USDC/CASH LP: 
 https://solscan.io/tx/2qREG6tg7mfpEZuHZUvExdoRTzsmjz63adXvztx9RTvwcSaVHDJkoPkN5h6vzy1EjkpWvpKry5vWYH4JyH1xC1NW

This was the only other transaction since then, where I took out the LP token after the hack happened

https://solscan.io/tx/5cnb4wQSwdAVDiWGWK49pTWnDx8pXu7svGDffxucPVK6a94P7VMbAUGTjx6BsAVGTGvYMmAKzyGh93Pek2QWNC28

5. 4,609 USDC

6. For some reason, despite losing under 100k and pooling the usdc/cash lp token, I wasn't refunded usdc (you can check the transaction history of my account). 

I am 17 years old from Thailand, and have been trying to make returns in crypto to help support my family. My dad works as a chef in a restaurant and I want to pay him back for helping me, I want to help him to retire soon as he is getting old and works 6 days a week. A lot of the money we had in crypto was lost with the hack, and I am very ashamed I lost a-lot of my fathers money, and upset that this will set him back and will need to work a-lot more before retiring. I thought that putting funds into LPs was very low risk but I was wrong. I am currently studying at school and want to go and study overseas, but it seems that my family do not have the finances to afford it currently. If the funds are returned then I would be very gracious. It will help my family very much, especially my father who can reduce his hours.

Thank you for reading, and I really appreciate if you can return the funds.
